Data - Class in data
The Data class models the set of transactions (or tuples)

DatabaseConnectionException - Exception in exceptions
The class "DatabaseConnectionException" is a custom exception class in Java that extends the built-in "Exception" class and is used to handle errors related to database connections.
DatabaseConnectionException(String) - Constructor for exception exceptions.DatabaseConnectionException
Constructor for the exception 'DatabaseConnectionException' class that takes a String parameter 'msg'.
DbAccess - Class in agent
The 'DbAccess' class establishes a connection to a MySQL database and provides methods for initializing, getting, and closing the connection.
DbAccess() - Constructor for class agent.DbAccess
 
DiscreteAttribute - Class in data
The DiscreteAttribute class represents an attribute with a set of discrete values and provides methods for getting the values, the number of distinct values, and the frequency of a specific value in a given data set.
DiscreteAttribute(String, int, String[]) - Constructor for class data.DiscreteAttribute
The constructor for the 'DiscreteAttribute' class.
DiscreteItem - Class in data
The DiscreteItem class extends the Item class and calculates the distance between two discrete attribute values.
DiscreteItem(DiscreteAttribute, String) - Constructor for class data.DiscreteItem
 
distance(Object) - Method in class data.ContinuousItem
This Java function determines the distance (in absolute value) between the scaled value stored in the current item (this.getValue()) and the scaled value associated with the parameter a.
distance(Object) - Method in class data.DiscreteItem
The function calculates the distance between two objects based on their values, returning 0 if they are equal and 1 if they are not.
distance(Object) - Method in class data.Item
This is an abstract method that calculates the distance between two objects and returns a double value.
